page.title: 02PROBUS VILLAGE NOW AND THEN
page.content: {Probus Village Now and Then} Probus today is partly a dormitary village & a place for retirement with a population of 1,600,an increase of 200 in 10 years.Over 50 years ago it was a working village.There are 2 grocery shops,then there were 9 but with a smaller variety of goods.Now most goods & services come from out_ side,then there were more provided locally eg.bakery,coal merchant.There are 3 builders now,which is unchanged & the abbatoir provides the same service as the meat yard then & employs the most,72 people.There was employment for rail & road gangs & many worked on the Trewithen Estate as servants,gardeners etc.The railway halt has now closed & Trewithen is reduced.There 136 unemployed people,88 men & 48 women.
